publ: by Brizo Kitchen and Bath Company
name: VoiceIQ
0:
”Alexa, ask Voice IQ to dispense 1 cup”
”Alexa, ask Voice IQ to turn on”
”Alexa, ask Voice IQ to fill coffee pot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice i. q.
des:
You can control your Brizo® faucet using only your voice. To get started, make sure you have a Brizo VoiceIQ™ account registered in the Brizo VoiceIQ web app by connecting your Brizo VoiceIQ module to the SmartTouch controller and bringing it online.

Then, you just need to enable the Brizo VoiceIQ skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to sign in with your Brizo VoiceIQ account.

When the connection is successfully built, you can simply control your Brizo faucet by saying :

- “Alexa, ask Voice IQ to turn on.” 
- “Alexa, ask Voice IQ to turn off.”
- “Alexa, ask Voice IQ to warm up.”
- “Alexa, ask Voice IQ to dispense 1 cup.”
- “Alexa, ask Voice IQ to fill coffee pot.”
